# Relating to the militant Algerian nationalist {{w|Mohammed Bellounis|lang=fr}}
types.html:
bellouniste (plural bellounistes)

  1. Relating to the militant Algerian nationalist Mohammed Bellounis

types.section:

# a supporter of {{w|Mohammed Bellounis|lang=fr}} during the {{w|Algerian War|lang=en}}

bellouniste m or f by sense (plural bellounistes)

  1. a supporter of Mohammed Bellounis during the Algerian War
trans: a supporter of Mohammed Bellounis during the Algerian War
